Ablative Coating.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Hitting an enemy with Poppy Bomb heals you for {scale=100|100}.

Air Blast.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Poppy Bomb increases your Air Control by {scale=10|10}% until you land.

Backdraft.card_desc: [Detonate] Reduce the cooldown of Poppy Bomb by {scale=0.1|0.1}s for every Sticky Bomb detonated.

Bomb Shelter.card_desc: [Weapon] Sticky Bombs deal {scale=20|20}% reduced Self Damage.

Chain Reaction.card_desc: [Detonate] When hitting an enemy with multiple bombs, each bomb after the first will deal 30% more damage.

Countdown.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Reduce the cooldown of Grumpy Bomb by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Doomsday.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Activating Grumpy Bomb heals you for {scale=50|50}.

Explosive Entrance.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Activating Poppy Bomb Heals you for {scale=50|50}.

Fallout.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Hitting an enemy with Grumpy Bomb reduces the cooldown of Poppy Bomb by {scale=1|1}s.

Jolt.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Poppy Bomb has {scale=15|15}% increased Knockback against enemies and explodes on contact with any surface.

King's Court.card_desc: [Detonate] Heal for {scale=15|15} for every Sticky Bomb Detonated

Mad Bomber.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Using Grumpy Bomb grants {scale=7|7}% Movement Speed for 2s.

Royal Decree.card_desc: [Detonate] Increase your Reload speed by {scale=5|5}% for 3s after using Detonate.

Royal Subjects.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase the explosion size of Sticky Bombs by 20%

Shock and Awe.card_desc: [Detonate] Getting a kill with Detonate grants {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 4s.

Uncontrolled.card_desc: [Armor] Kills reduce your active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}%.
